name: Draught Kraft
description:
Construct your dream brewery, kraft the best tasting brew, build a brewing empire!
Start from humble beginnings in your garage with simple equipment and the support of your friends and family. Experiment with different ingredients to create the best tasting recipe. Gain popularity and expand your business to larger buildings, hire employees, unlock new ingredients and bigger equipment. Grow and grow to be the biggest brewery around.

  • Experiment with different custom recipes
  • Unlock tons of ingredients and flavors
  • Use a multitude of machinery to create your supply line
  • Obtain and fulfill business contracts
  • Hire and manage employees for your daily operations
  • Defend against hazards such as bacteria, rats, and fires
